comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Marshmallow route, eh? Well fine. Let SB broadcast his roomtemp _dreksturm_ of flaccid innuendo.... I'm unfazed; it rolls right off my back. Doesn't bug me in the least that he sends out these toothless screeds on a regular basis, clicking away at his Barbie-blue laptop from deep within his bower of silk pillows and Cointreau bon-bons. I'm tough; bring it on, baby! I'm thinking three laps of Scott Carpenter today, in low gears. Any joiners? DU

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Well, Hideo (of PC maintenance fame, where they do real work and drink real protein shakes) has invited me on a little jaunt north up Highwaye 36, coming back over Ye Olde Stage Roade. Anyone? Anyone? Noon at Gate 6.

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: I'm likely to do Flag again...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm tag-teaming the lab w/ Tim today, trying to keep 2 sections of panicky, round-eyed students from pinning us to the mat. (Their projects are due tomorrow: Oh-my-God-why-didn't-anyone-warn-us!!??) As soon as Tim shows, I'm away for a ride. But it may be well after noon. Sean, when are you leaving? DU

comments.author: iSean
comments.body: Dave's bailing on me, and I think I'm actually going to follow suit. It's a bit chilly out there, and I only have my bike shirt and my nevernude shorts.
